info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 5:21PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Idaho and south central Clearwater Counties through 445 PM PDT... At 420 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pierce, or 25 miles northeast of Kamiah, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pierce and Musselshell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
